de.szut.dqi12.cheftrainer.connectorlib.cipher

Class CipherFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.szut.dqi12.cheftrainer.connectorlib.cipher.CipherFactory

  • public class CipherFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    The CipherFactory should be used to easy encrypt/decrypt Strings with the given algorithm and key.
    Author:
    Alexander Brennecke
